abstract: Driven column reviews Kia Cadenza sedan.

headline.print_headline: Plenty of Pampering for the Budget-Minded
headline.main: Video Review: Kia Cadenza Offers Budget-Minded Pampering

snippet: The Cadenza does not offer the indulgences of German cars, but it looks rich at a nonrich price, staring at about $33,000....
lead_paragraph: The Cadenza does not offer the indulgences of German cars, but it looks rich at a nonrich price, staring at about $33,000.
